Posts.Content: Hi, such a coincidence I saw this thread today, I finished T 5 weeks ago and my nails were fine but in last couple of weeks they've all gone yellow, brittle and 3 fell off this morning when I was cleaning the bath! Always knew cleaning was bad for you! Look totally gross! Still have tingling fingers and toes too and frustrating that it's impossible to do Coke ring pulls!
Posts.Title: Nails on 'T'

Posts.Content: LOL, yes Ive got one chin hair that refused to budge!! Thanks for reassuring me, sooooo looking forward to hair growing back and pleased to hear the tamoxifen didn't stand in its way! Thanks xx
Posts.Title: Tamoxifen straight after chemo

Posts.Content: Hi everyone, I've just (2weeks ago) had last of 6 FEC-T chemo and my oncologist has started me on Tamoxifen already.  Due to start radiotherapy next week.  Have lost all (yes, all!!) body hair and I'm just worried that the Tamoxifen might interfere with my hair coming back seeing as the side effects could be 'thinning hair'.  Anyone got any experiences of this?
Posts.Title: Tamoxifen straight after chemo
